data.text: Vi nyanu ɖoa to fofoa ƒe amehehe,
Ame ƒe nu ƒe kutsetsee wòtsɔna ɖua nu nyuiwoe,
Ame si dzɔa eƒe nuyiwo ŋuti la dzɔa eƒe agbe ŋuti,
Nu dzroa kuviatɔ vevie gake mekpɔa naneke o,
Ame dzɔdzɔe léa fu alakpanya,
Dzɔdzɔenyenye dzɔa ŋutsu fɔmaɖila ƒe agbe ŋuti,
Ame aɖe wɔna abe kesinɔtɔe wònye ene, evɔ naneke mele esi o,
Ame ƒe kesinɔnuwo ate ŋu aƒle eƒe agbe ta
Ame dzɔdzɔe ƒe kekeli klẽna nyuie,
Dzre sɔŋ ko dada hena vɛ,
Ga si wokpɔ to mɔ fitifiti dzi la nu va yina,
Mɔkpɔkpɔ si woɖe ɖa la nana dzi léa dɔ,
Ame si doa vlo amehehe la xɔa eŋufetu,
Nunyala ƒe nufiafia nye agbevudo,
Gɔmesese nyui hea amenuveve vanɛ,
Nunyala ɖe sia ɖe wɔa nu kple gɔmesese,
Dɔtsɔla vɔ̃ɖi gena ɖe dzɔgbevɔ̃e me,
Ame si do toku amehehe la,
Didi si vaa eme la vivina na luʋɔ,
Ame si zɔna kple nunyala la, dzea nunya,
Dzɔgbevɔ̃e tia vɔ̃wɔla yome
Ame nyui gblẽa domenyinu ɖi na via ƒe viwo,
Ame dahe ƒe agble wɔa nuku geɖe,
Ame si vea nu le ameƒoti gbɔ la léa fu via,
Ame dzɔdzɔe ɖua nu ɖia ƒo,
